S

setDiacritics() - Method in class com.company.Text
Private method setting the diacritics field, which is private and its type is Map(Character - diacritical mark, Integer - number of occurrence)
setFields(String, View) - Method in class com.company.Text
A public method setting private fields in this class by running setting methods of this class: splitSentence(), setNumberOfChars(), setNumberOfWords(), setPalindromes(), setLetters(), setDiacritics().
setLetters() - Method in class com.company.Text
Private method setting the letter field, which is private and its type is Map(Integer - number of letters, Integer - number of words with that many letters)
setNumberOfChars() - Method in class com.company.Text
Private method setting the numberOfChars field, which is private and its type is int.
setNumberOfWords() - Method in class com.company.Text
Private method setting the numberOfWords field, which is private and its type is int.
setPalindromes() - Method in class com.company.Text
Private method setting the palindromes field, which is private and its type is Map(String - palindrome, Integer - number of its occurrence in the text ).
setPrecision(double) - Method in class com.company.View
Private method setting precision of given value to two decimal places.
setStringFromUser() - Method in class com.company.Controller
Public method setting the data (text to be analyzed), typed by the user, in the string field, which is private.
splitSentence() - Method in class com.company.Text
Private method setting the words field, which is private, by splitting the sentence using regex.
string - Variable in class com.company.Controller
Private field storing the string given by user to be analyzed in program.
string - Variable in class com.company.Text
A private field holding string (text) given by user
